name: FoxIsland
description:
Players need to control a little fox to go home and collect as many cherries as possible along the way.

Operations:

WASD  - base movement

E - place ladder

Q - cancle ladder

SPACE -  jump

CTRL - crouch

SPACE+CTRL - stamp

Please leave your comments if you have any thoughts or suggestions.I'd love to see them very much!

Sincerely thank these great artists and their game assets. You can download them from these websites.

Game assets and backgrounds:

https://anokolisa.itch.io/high-forest-assets-pack
